content: The Title Of My Home Page. Michael Werman                                     מיכאל ורמן Computer Science The Hebrew University of Jerusalem Jerusalem 91904 Israel e-mail: michael.werman@mail.huji.ac.il phone: +972-2-54-94541 fax:     +972-2-54-94541 office: C428, Rothberg Building, Givat Ram Campus Research Interests: Computer Vision, Geometric Algorithms, Statistical Algorithms Publications: I am always looking to supervise bright and motivated graduate students in areas relating to computer vision, image processing, graphics and geometric or statistical algorithms. Please take at least a cursory look at some of my papers before contacting me. Cana Cameroon
